verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hosanna, hosanna Hosanna in the highest Hosanna, hosanna Hosanna in the highest Hosanna in the highest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Heal my heart and make it clean Open up my eyes to the things unseen Show me how to love like You have loved me 10. Break my heart for what breaks Yours Everything I am for Your kingdom’s cause As I walk from earth into eternity 11. Hosanna, hosanna Hosanna in the highest Hosanna, hosanna Hosanna in the highest 12. Hosanna, hosanna Hosanna in the highest Hosanna, hosanna Hosanna in the highest Hosanna in the highest Hosanna in the highest Hosanna in the highest{/lang-eng}
